definition: to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
to wade/to be involved/to concern/to experience/to enter (classical)

sentences.english: We can never be frightened when our principles are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 牵涉到我们的原则时，我们是永远也吓不倒的。

sentences.english: Some are programs that involve doctors.
sentences.chinese: 一些训练程式牵涉到医生。

sentences.english: The human element was Admiral Halsey's frame of mind.
sentences.chinese: 人事因素，牵涉到海尔赛将军的想法。

sentences.english: The case involved many innocent people.
sentences.chinese: 这一案件牵涉了许多无辜的人。

sentences.english: Individuation involves the growth of a unique human being through a deepening of awareness.
sentences.chinese: 个体化牵涉到独特的人的成长，透过知觉的深化。

sentences.english: What is meant by what is involved in jouissance?
sentences.chinese: 生命的欢爽所牵涉的内涵是什么意思？

sentences.english: All these problems have to do with our policies relating to the exercise of regional national autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 这一系列问题，牵涉到实行民族区域自治的政策。

sentences.english: If the investigation turns up hidden corruption, we will also deal with this according to the law and there will not be any soft-pedaling.
sentences.chinese: 如果牵涉到腐败，我们一定会依法处理，绝不手软。

sentences.english: Denial is the default position when it comes to nuclear waste.
sentences.chinese: 牵涉到核废料时，拒绝面对是默认立场。

sentences.english: There really are different brain mechanisms involved.
sentences.chinese: 库尼奥斯博士说，“这牵涉到不同的脑部运行机制。”

sentences.english: Homoserine has also been implicated in the biosynthesis of methionine.
sentences.chinese: 同型丝氨酸也牵涉到蛋氨酸的生物合成。

sentences.english: The long multi-layered process is ending.
sentences.chinese: 漫长而且又牵涉许多层面的争取过程，终告一段落。

sentences.english: The readout step also involves measuring anyon states.
sentences.chinese: 读取的步骤也牵涉到如何测量任意子的状态。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, orexins have also been implicated in regulating appetite and feelings of reward.
sentences.chinese: 同时，食欲素也牵涉到食欲和感官情感回报的调节。

sentences.english: A person who is seated instead of standing erect--destinies hang upon such a thing as that.
sentences.chinese: 一个人的一起一坐竟会牵涉到许多人的命运。
这项计划牵涉到许多部门。

definition: this is no small thing (idiom)/to have a serious matter at hand
to be drawn into/to be involved in
to involve others (in a crime)/guilt by association
to pass through one's hands/to handle/to deal with
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
